title: Manage Team Salary Cap
description: A General Manager needs to sign a new player but must ensure the team stays under the league's salary cap.

tasks.description: Retrieve the team's current roster and salary data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a list of all players and their current salaries.

tasks.description: Calculate the team's current total salary and the remaining cap space.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates that the team has $2 million in available cap space.

tasks.description: Model the impact of the proposed new player contract on the salary cap.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the new contract fits within the available cap space.
